name: 2-In-1 Fun Pack: Dreamworks Madagascar: Operation Penguin / Dreamworks Shrek 2
description:
2-In-1 Fun Pack: Dreamworks Madagascar: Operation Penguin + Dreamworks Shrek 2 is a compilation of games developed by Vicarious Visions and published by Activision for Game Boy Advance.

The game features two games based on Dreamworks movies on a single cartridge. The game features a menu that allows players to choose which game to play.
